frame.name: Sociability
frame.definition:
<def-root>These words describe how outgoing or sociable a <fen>Protagonist</fen> is judged to be by a (usually implicit) <fen>Judge</fen>, often in a particular context, either with certain people (the <fen>Company</fen>), or about a particular situation, topic or event (the <fen>Content</fen>).
As opposed to the Social_interaction_evaluation frame, this frame talks about <ment>how much</ment> someone interacts, not <ment>how well</ment>. <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Protagonist">He</fex> <m>was</m> <t>shy</t> <fex name="Company">with strangers</fex> and afraid of showing his feelings.</ex>
<ex>Unfortunately <fex name="Protagonist">he</fex>'<m>s</m> <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>gregarious</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition: <def-root>The Protagonist is the person whose sociability is being described. <ex><fex name="Protagonist">Pat</fex> is <t>sociable</t>.</ex> <ex>Pat was a very <t>shy</t> <fex name="Protagonist">child</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Protagonist">Pat</fex> is a <t>loner</t>.</ex> <ex>Everyone had heard about the <t>recluse</t> <fex name="Protagonist">SLF</fex> who lived on the hill. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Company
FE.definition: <def-root>The Protagonist may be sociable, shy, outgoing, etc. when with particular Company (specific people or types of people). Company usually occurs in a PP Complement with a target adjective: <ex>Kim is <t>shy</t> <fex name="Company">of strangers</fex>.</ex> <ex>The children are <t>friendly</t> <fex name="Company">to everyone they meet</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Content
FE.definition: <def-root>The Protagonist may be sociable, shy, outgoing, etc. when in a particular situation, or about performing some action. <ex>Kim is <t>outgoing</t> <fex name="Content">when traveling alone</fex>.</ex> <ex>Kim is <t>timid</t> <fex name="Content">about meeting new people</fex>. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual whose point of view is taken in assigning the judgment denoted by the target.
<ex>Pongo is very <t>shy</t>, <fex name="jud">In my opinion</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: kluizenaar.n
lexUnit.definition: die ver van andere mensen woont en niet naar gezelschap verlangt
